[Groovy] Class Groovysh

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.tools.shell.Shell
      org.codehaus.groovy.tools.shell.Groovysh

class Groovysh
extends Shell

An interactive shell for evaluating Groovy code from the command-line (aka. groovysh).

Authors:
Jason Dillon
Version:
